install.name: RokContentRotator
install.description:
RokContentRotator Module

ContentRotator module created for rt_synapse template
install.author: RocketTheme, LLC

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: show_title
param.label: Show Rotator Title
param.description: Select whether to show the Rotator module title

param.name: show_front
param.label: Frontpage Items
param.description: Show/Hide items designated for the Frontpage - only works when in Content Items only mode

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (default 5)

param.name: catid
param.label: Category
param.description: Selects items from a specific Category.

param.name: secid
param.label: Section
param.description: Selects items from a specific Secion.

param.name: click_title
param.label: Click Title
param.description: Do you need to click title or just hover

param.name: show_readmore
param.label: Show Read More
param.description: Should the Read More link be shown?

param.name: readmore
param.label: Read More Label
param.description: Text to display for readmore if titles are NOT linked

param.name: duration
param.label: Transition Duration
param.description: Duration in ms of cross-blend transition

param.name: preview_count
param.label: Preview Length
param.description: Length of characters to show in MooTools preview

param.name: module_cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
